Cosmonaut to set record Sunday for most time spent in space, Russian news agencies reportRussian cosmonaut Oleg Kononenko is expected to set a world record on Sunday for the duration of space flights with nearly 2-1/2 years in total, Russian news agencies reported. Australia PM to introduce bill to reshape tax cuts on TuesdayAustralia's Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said on Sunday his government would legislate changes this week to planned tax cuts set to reduce benefits to the wealthy while giving low-income earners more breaks, as Australians endure higher living costs.
